Package com.intellij.psi.codeStyle

Class CodeStyleSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.codeStyle.CommonCodeStyleSettings
      • com.intellij.psi.codeStyle.LegacyCodeStyleSettings
        • com.intellij.psi.codeStyle.CodeStyleSettings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JDOMExternalizable, ImportsLayoutSettings, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CodeStyleSchemesModel.ModelSettings, TransientCodeStyleSettings

    public class CodeStyleSettings
extends LegacyCodeStyleSettings
implements java.lang.Cloneable, JDOMExternalizable, ImportsLayoutSettings
    A container for global, language and custom code style settings and indent options. Global options are default options for multiple languages and language-independent settings. Global (default) options which may be overwritten by a specific language can be retrieved using getDefault...() methods. Use getCommonSettings(Language) to retrieve code style options for a language. Some languages may have specific options which are stored in a class derived from CustomCodeStyleSettings. Use getCustomSettings(Class) to access them. For indent options use one of getIndentOptions(...) methods. In most cases you need getIndentOptionsByFile(PsiFile).

    Consider also using an utility CodeStyle class which encapsulates the above methods where possible.

    Note: A direct use of any non-final public fields from CodeStyleSettings class is strongly discouraged. These fields, as well as the inheritance from CommonCodeStyleSettings, are left only for backwards compatibility and may be removed in the future.

      • getIndentOptions

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptions()
        Overrides:
        getIndentOptions in class CommonCodeStyleSettings

      • getIndentOptions

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptions(FileType fileType)
        If the file type has an associated language and language indent options are defined, returns these options. Otherwise attempts to find indent options from FileTypeIndentOptionsProvider. If none are found, other indent options are returned.
        Parameters:
        fileType - The file type to search indent options for.
        Returns:
        File type indent options or OTHER_INDENT_OPTIONS.
        See Also:
        FileTypeIndentOptionsProvider, LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider

      • getIndentOptionsByDocument

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsByDocument(Project project,
                                                                        Document document)
        If the document has an associated PsiFile, returns options for this file. Otherwise attempts to find associated VirtualFile and return options for corresponding FileType. If none are found, other indent options are returned.
        Parameters:
        project - The project in which PsiFile should be searched.
        document - The document to search indent options for.
        Returns:
        Indent options from the indent options providers or file type indent options or OTHER_INDENT_OPTIONS.
        See Also:
        FileIndentOptionsProvider, FileTypeIndentOptionsProvider, LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider

      • getIndentOptionsByFile

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsByFile(PsiFile file)

      • getIndentOptionsByFile

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsByFile(PsiFile file,
                                                                    TextRange formatRange)

      • getIndentOptionsByFile

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsByFile(PsiFile file,
                                                                    TextRange formatRange,
                                                                    boolean ignoreDocOptions,
                                                                    Processor<? super FileIndentOptionsProvider> providerProcessor)
        Retrieves indent options for PSI file from an associated document or (if not defined in the document) from file indent options providers.
        Parameters:
        file - The PSI file to retrieve options for.
        formatRange - The text range within the file for formatting purposes or null if there is either no specific range or multiple ranges. If the range covers the entire file (full reformat), options stored in the document are ignored and indent options are taken from file indent options providers.
        ignoreDocOptions - Ignore options stored in the document and use file indent options providers even if there is no text range or the text range doesn't cover the entire file.
        providerProcessor - A callback object containing a reference to indent option provider which has returned indent options.
        Returns:
        Indent options from the associated document or file indent options providers.
        See Also:
        FileIndentOptionsProvider

      • getLanguageIndentOptions

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getLanguageIndentOptions(Language language)
        Returns language indent options or, if the language doesn't have any options of its own, indent options configured for other file types.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to get indent options for.
        Returns:
        Language indent options.

      • getCommonSettings

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings getCommonSettings(Language lang)
        Attempts to get language-specific common settings from LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider.
        Parameters:
        lang - The language to get settings for.
        Returns:
        If the provider for the language exists and is able to create language-specific default settings (LanguageCodeStyleSettingsProvider.getDefaultCommonSettings() doesn't return null) returns the instance of settings for this language. Otherwise returns new instance of common code style settings with default values.

      • getCommonSettings

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings getCommonSettings(java.lang.String langName)
        Parameters:
        langName - The language name.
        Returns:
        Language-specific code style settings or shared settings if not found.
        See Also:
        CommonCodeStyleSettingsManager.getCommonSettings(com.intellij.lang.Language)

      • getRightMargin

        public int getRightMargin(Language language)
        Retrieves right margin for the given language. The language may overwrite default RIGHT_MARGIN value with its own RIGHT_MARGIN in language's CommonCodeStyleSettings instance.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to get right margin for or null if root (default) right margin is requested.
        Returns:
        The right margin for the language if it is defined (not null) and its settings contain non-negative margin. Root (default) margin otherwise (CodeStyleSettings.RIGHT_MARGIN).

      • setRightMargin

        public void setRightMargin(Language language,
                           int rightMargin)
        Assigns another right margin for the language or (if it is null) to root (default) margin.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to assign the right margin to or null if root (default) right margin is to be changed.
        rightMargin - New right margin.

      • isWrapOnTyping

        public boolean isWrapOnTyping(Language language)
        Defines whether or not wrapping should occur when typing reaches right margin.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to check the option for or null for a global option.
        Returns:
        True if wrapping on right margin is enabled.

      • getSoftMargins

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getSoftMargins(Language language)
        Returns soft margins (visual indent guides positions) for the language. If language settings do not exists or language soft margins are empty, default (root) soft margins are returned.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to retrieve soft margins for or null for default soft margins.
        Returns:
        Language or default soft margins.
        See Also:
        getDefaultSoftMargins()

        Set soft margins (visual indent guides) for the language. Note: language code style settings must exist.
        Parameters:
        language - The language to set soft margins for.
        softMargins - The soft margins to set.
